request.description:
# Description
Returns a JSON object for each chef in the database
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
None
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each chef JSON object has the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean,
        "description": String
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving chefs from database

# Description
Returns an array of arrays of JSON objects of the chefs wihtin a radius of a certain zipcode. The chefs are grouped by zipcode. 
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
The query string requires the parameters ```zipcode``` and ```radius```

# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each chef JSON has the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean,
        "description": String
    }
```

# Description
Adds a new chef to the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
    "name": String,
    "password": String,
    "events": [Event],
    "incomingReviews": [Review],
    "outgoingReviews": [Review],
    "zipcode": Number
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new chef is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "objectId": mongooseTypes.ObjectId,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in saving the new chef

# Description
Returns a JSON object for each event in the database
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
None
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each event JSON object has the following form:
```
{
    "title": String,
    "time": Date,
    "tags": [String],
    "chefs": [User],
    "host": User,
    "dishes": [Dish]
}
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving events from database

# Description
Adds a new event to the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
    "Title": String,
    "Time": Date,
    "Tags": [String],
    "Host": User,
    "Chefs": [Chef],
    "Dishes": [Dish],
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new event is returned with the following form:
```
{
    "title": String,
    "time": Date,
    "tags": [String],
    "chefs": [Chef],
    "host": User,
    "dishes": [Dish]
}
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in saving the new event

body.raw:
{
	"name": "Paul Eggert",
	"password": "password1",
	"passwordConf": "password1",
	"chef": true,
	"email": "eggert@test.com",
	"zipcode": 90024,
	"dishes": ["turkey"],
	"tags": ["Thanksgiving"],
	"description": "Amateur looking to hone skills"
}

request.description:
# Description
Creates a new user in the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"name": string,
	"password": string,
	"passwordConf": string
	"chef": Boolean,
	"email": String,
	"zipcode": Number
}
```
where ```PasswordConf``` must be the same as ```Password```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure
	- e.g., passwords do not match, error adding user to database, etc.

# Description
Creates a new user in the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"name": string,
	"password": string,
	"passwordConf": string
	"chef": Boolean,
	"email": String,
	"zipcode": Number
}
```
where ```PasswordConf``` must be the same as ```Password```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure
	- e.g., passwords do not match, error adding user to database, etc.

	"chef": true,
	"email": "ramsay@test.com",
	"zipcode": 94133,
	"dishes": ["roast turkey", "mashed cauliflower", "lingonberry sauce"],
	"tags": ["Thanksgiving", "experimental", "vegetarian"],
	"description": "Thanksgiving dinner with a twist"
}

request.description:
# Description
Creates a new user in the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"name": string,
	"password": string,
	"passwordConf": string
	"chef": Boolean,
	"email": String,
	"zipcode": Number
}
```
where ```PasswordConf``` must be the same as ```Password```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure
	- e.g., passwords do not match, error adding user to database, etc.

# Description
Creates a new user in the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"name": string,
	"password": string,
	"passwordConf": string
	"chef": Boolean,
	"email": String,
	"zipcode": Number
}
```
where ```PasswordConf``` must be the same as ```Password```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure
	- e.g., passwords do not match, error adding user to database, etc.

# Description
Returns a JSON object for each review in the database
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
None
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each review JSON object has the following form:
```
{
    "rating": Number,
    "reviewee": Number
}
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving reviews from database

# Description
Adds a new review to the database.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
    "Rating": Number,
    "Reviewee": Number
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the new review is returned with the following form:
```
{
    "rating": Number,
    "reviewee": Number
}
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in saving the new review
	- e.g., the reviewer does not exist, the reviewee does not exist, etc.

# Description
Returns a JSON object for each user in the database
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
None
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each user JSON object has the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean,
        "description": String
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving users from database

# Description
Updates the password of the user with ```id```
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
    "password": String
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the updated user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean,
        "description": String
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in saving the new user

# Description
Updates the ```events``` of the user with ```id```
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
    "events": [ Event ]
}
```
where ```Event``` has the form
```
{
	    "title": String,
        "time": Number,
        "date": String,
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef_id": Number,
        "host_id": Number,
        "dishes": [ String ],
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object for the updated user is returned with the following form:
```
    {
        "id": Number,
        "_id": Number,
        "name": String,
        "password": String,
        "email": String,
        "zipcode": Number,
        "events": [ Event ],
        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
        "dishes": [ String ],
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef": Boolean,
        "description": String
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in updating the user

# Description
Updates the ```outgoingReviews``` of the user with ```id```
# Request Parameters

```
{
    "reviews": [Review]
}

where ```Review``` has the following form:

{

}
```

- ```400 Bad Request``` on failure in updating the user

# Description
Returns a JSON containing all events a user is hosting
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each event JSON object has the following form:
```
    {
        "title": String,
        "time": Number,
        "date": String,
        "host_id": Number,
        "tags": [ String ],
        "chef_id": Number,
        "dishes": [ String ],
    }
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving events from the user

# Description
Returns a JSON object containing all the ```Reviews``` a user has written
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each ```Review``` JSON object has the following form:
```
{
    "rating": Number,
    "subject_id": Number
}
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving reviews from database

# Description
Returns a JSON object containing all the ```dishes``` a user has (mainly for chefs)
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each ```dish``` returned is a single String, with the overall returned object in the following form:
```
[
    "dish1",
    "dish2",
    "dish3"
]
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving reviews from database

# Description
Returns a JSON object containing all the ```tags``` a user has (mainly for chefs)
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. Each ```tag``` returned is a single String, with the overall returned object in the following form:
```
[
    "tag1",
    "tag2",
    "tag3"
]
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving reviews from database

# Description
Returns a JSON object containing the ```description``` (a single String) a user has (mainly for chefs)
# Authorization
None
# Request Parameters
```id```: The user's id
# Response Format
- ```200 OK``` on success. The ```description``` returned is a JSON object with a single String, with the overall returned object in the following form:
```
"Some description"
```
- ```400 Bad Request``` on error retrieving reviews from database

# Description
Logs user in.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"Email": string,
	"Password": string
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object is returned with the following form:
```
	{
		"auth": true,
	    {
	        "id": Number,
	        "_id": Number,
	        "name": String,
	        "password": String,
	        "email": String,
	        "zipcode": Number,
	        "events": [ Event ],
	        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
	        "dishes": [ String ],
	        "tags": [ String ],
	        "chef": Boolean,
	        "description": String
	    }
	}
```
- ```400 All fields required.``` if not all fields filled
- ```401 Wrong username or password.``` if either of the credentials is wrong

# Description
Logs user in.
# Required Body
Requires JSON in the form of 
```
{
	"LoginName": string,
	"LoginPassword": string
}
```
# Response Codes
- ```200 OK``` on success. A JSON object is returned with the following form:
```
	{
		"auth": true,
	    {
	        "id": Number,
	        "_id": Number,
	        "name": String,
	        "password": String,
	        "email": String,
	        "zipcode": Number,
	        "events": [ Event ],
	        "outgoingReviews": [ Review ],
	        "dishes": [ String ],
	        "tags": [ String ],
	        "chef": Boolean,
	        "description": String
	    }
	}
```
- ```400 All fields required.``` if not all fields filled
- ```401 Wrong username or password.``` if either of the credentials is wrong
